mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER (email, password, name, photo, authority, occupation) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{photo}, #{authority}, #{occupation})
mapper.select: SELECT email as username, password, authority FROM TB_USER where email=#{username}
SELECT email, name, photo, occupation FROM TB_USER where email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET password = #{userPW} WHERE user_id=#{userNo}
